snippet.title: Riptide GP®: Renegade Official Trailer 2
snippet.description:
GET IT HERE: http://onelink.to/rgpr-vu

Lay your eyes on the second official trailer from our new game Riptide GP: Renegade!  There's loads of new stuff in this trailer, including a sampling of new vehicles, characters, and tracks.  

In Riptide GP: Renegade, armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls, outrun cops, and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.  The new game in the popular franchise brings all new tracks, vehicles, and characters, all playable in single player, split screen and online multiplayer races.

Riptide GP: Renegade is coming soon to iOS, Apple TV, Android, Android TV, Kindle, FireTV, Xbox One, PlayStation4, Windows 10 + Windows 10 mobile, and Steam.
